name: Kyle Morgan
story: Kyle joined the army as soon as he turned 18. He was drawn to the discipline and structure of military life. He has served several tours of duty in different parts of the world and learned to adapt to different cultures and environments. Kyle's technical skills as an engineer have proved invaluable to his unit. He is always on the lookout for ways to improve their equipment and infrastructure. His ultimate goal is to retire from the army and start his own construction company.
